add-loan-section.available: The amount of loan available for you:
add-loan-section.title: In need of another loan?

back-accounts-section.adding-accounts: Adding more bank accounts can increase your credit rating and therefor higher the loan possibilities.
back-accounts-section.title: Bank accounts

correct-info.body+: Please contact our helpdesk at [{phonelabel}](tel:{phonevalue}). Our helpdesk is available for free from Monday to Friday from 8h am to 21h and Saturday from 8h to 18h.
correct-info.title: Is this information not correct?

empty-state.body: Once your loan application is approved, you will receive an email and off course the money on your bank account. If you then return here, you will find all your loan information here in one place.
empty-state.title: Your loan application is being reviewed

help-section.body: If you have any questions, please feel free to give us a call. Our help desk is open Mondays to Fridays from 8 am to 21h and Saturday from 8h to 18h.
help-section.title: Can we help you with something?

loan-section.cancellation: Cancellation is possible within 14 days after application. If you want to cancel, please call the help desk.
loan-section.head: {amount} Loan from {date}

not-eligable-without-reason.body+: If you have any questions please contact the help desk at [012 - 3456 7890](tel:+01234567890).
not-eligable-without-reason.subtitle: Unfortunately you are not eligible for a loan
not-eligable-without-reason.title: Unfortunately you are not eligible for a loan

not-eligable-with-reason.intro+: Unfortunately you are not eligible for a loan. The resons for this are the following:
not-eligable-with-reason.outro+: If you have any questions please contact the help desk at [012 - 3456 7890](tel:+01234567890)
not-eligable-with-reason.title: Not eligible for loan

change-email.body: Do you want te recieve emails on a different address? You can change your email here.
change-email.title: Change your email address

change-pin.body: If you want, you can change your PIN code. Make sure you have your telephone ready when resetting your PIN code.
change-pin.title: Change your PIN-code

delete-account-section.body: Do you want to delete your account? Please contact the help desk [{phonelabel}](tel:{phonevalue}). You can request them to remove your account. After you've repaid all your loans, your account will be automatically deleted after 90 days.
delete-account-section.title: Delete your account

questions-section.body: If you have any questions, please feel free to give us a call. Our help desk is open Mondays to Fridays from 8 am to 21h and Saturday from 8h to 18h.
questions-section.title: Do you have any questinos?
